mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER ( M_USERID, M_USERNAME, M_PASSWD, M_POSTNUM, M_ADDR, M_ADDR_D, M_TEL, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, M_EMAIL_ACCEPT ) VALUES ( #{m_userid}, #{m_username}, #{m_passwd}, #{m_postnum}, #{m_addr}, #{m_addr_d}, #{m_tel}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_email}, #{m_email_accept} )
mapper.select: SELECT M_USERID, M_USERNAME, M_PASSWD, M_POSTNUM, M_ADDR, M_ADDR_D, M_TEL, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, M_EMAIL_ACCEPT, M_POINT, M_REGDATE, M_UPDATEDATE, M_LASTDATE, M_AUTHCODE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE M_USERID = #{m_userid}
